text: The helicopter pad on Coffin Mountain Coffin Mountain is a mountain located in the Willamette National Forest in Linn County, Oregon. Coffin Mountain is best known for its astonishing hike that goes to the summit. It is located nearby Bachelor Mountain. Coffin Mountain stands 5,770 ft above sea level (1,759 m). The top has views of the Cascade Mountain Range. The mountain also has an array of wildflowers and beargrass. The top of the mountain has a lookout which was built in 1984 and a helicopter pad. The lookout is used to spot wildfires. ==References== Category:Mountains of Oregon Category:Mountains of Linn County, Oregon
